modName: Lower First Person Weapons XPMS edition
summary: lower first person weapons for XP32 Maximum Skeleton
descriptionHtml:
extract into your skyrim/data folder, if you overwrite make sure to backup your previous skeleton

ideal for enhanced camera but will not work with immersive first person as it does not use vanilla 1stperson setup

images taken with default FOV, 90 is recommended

for troubleshooting purposes, folder for file is */skyrim/data/meshes/actors/character/_1stperson/

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3381541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Check out my other mods![/url]
author: Groovtama and mrjentipede
